mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONTACT ( user_no, contact_title, contact_content, contact_password ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{contactTitle}, #{contactContent}, #{contactPassword} )
mapper.select: SELECT contact_no, contact_no as no, CONTACT.user_no, USER.user_name, contact_title, contact_content, contact_password, contact_date, (select count(1) from CONTACT_COMMENT where CONTACT_COMMENT.contact_no = no) as contact_comment_count FROM CONTACT JOIN USER ON USER.user_no = CONTACT.user_no ORDER BY CONTACT.contact_no desc LIMIT #{startBoardNo}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT contact_no, user_no, contact_title, contact_content, contact_password, contact_date FROM CONTACT WHERE contact_no = #{contactNo}
SELECT COUNT(contact_password) FROM CONTACT WHERE contact_no = #{contactNo}
SELECT COUNT(contact_password) FROM CONTACT WHERE contact_no = #{contactNo} AND contact_password = #{contactPassword}
SELECT contact_no, contact_comment_no, contact_comment_content, contact_comment_date FROM CONTACT_COMMENT ORDER BY contact_comment_no desc LIMIT 1
SELECT contact_no, contact_comment_no, contact_comment_content, contact_comment_date FROM CONTACT_COMMENT WHERE contact_no = #{contactNo}
